concept.title: 247.001 DEFINITIONS.

conbody.p: For definitions of "Civil Reserve Air Fleet" and "Voluntary Intermodal Sealift
Agreement," see Joint Pub 1-02, DoD Dictionary of Military and Associated Terms. See additional information at PGI 247.001 for the Voluntary Intermodal Sealift Agreement program.
